module.name: leguide
module.description: LeGuide.com Group, the network of shopping guides, price comparison sites, shopping search engines and online consumer forums, is the domain leader in France and number 2 across Europe, with 12
module.description_full: LeGuide.com Group, the network of shopping guides, price comparison sites, shopping search engines and online consumer forums, is the domain leader in France and number 2 across Europe, with 12.8 million unique visitors. The company is a trusted intermediary between users and shop sites, and helps shoppers with every stage of their online purchases, helping them to hit that shopping high through scores of special offers. LeGuide.com Group is present in 14 countries and lists over 60.000 online shops and 135 million products. (*Comscore April 2010) Features Leguide.com The module will allow you to : - synchronize your entire shop to LeGuide.com automatically taking into account the specific scheduling LeGuide.com This will give you the opportunity to develop your business and showcase your site your best deals. Find all the modules for PrestaShop comparators in category comparateurs de prix PrestaShop

module.name: seohelping
module.description: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.description_full: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.additional_description: This module allows you to optimize your SEO in a few clicks. Very easy to use, this module will fill automatically all the essential Meta tags for a good search engine optimization, whatever the number of your products. You will have unique tags for each of your pages and keywords that fit exactly your products. The visibility is a key success factor for an online store. Many studies revealed that approximately 85% of the Internet users do not go beyond the first result page. This proves that without a good SEO, nobody will find your products. Reach your objectives with this worthy module! Essential for any good merchant!﻿﻿

module.name: iadvize
module.description: Give your visitors support wherever they are! Increase your sales with iAdvize: Click to Chat, Click to call, Click to video
module.description_full: Give your visitors support wherever they are! Increase your sales with iAdvize: Click to Chat, Click to call, Click to video. The device your visitors are using should not prevent them from getting fast, free and easy support. Desktop, tablet, smartphone... iAdvize enables you to advise your visitors wherever and whenever!
module.additional_description: Increase your conversion rates On ecommerce websites, an average of only 2% of visitors complete their purchase without support. That's a long way off compared to the transformation rate in shops which is approximately 55%. Today, Click to Chat and Click to Call are the channels which offer the best conversion rate: on average, 20% of visitors who receive support finalise their purchase. Generate incremental sales With iAdvize, your agents can offer help in the right place and at the right time. This way, transform your visitors into clients thanks to the help of support and sales agents! The methodology we use to measure the increment enables us to calculate the sales which would not have been completed if the agent had not provided the support needed.

module.name: amazon
module.description: Prestashop Addons exclusive, the Amazon Market Place for Prestashop is the #1 solution to sell your products online to Amazon Marketplace
module.description_full: Prestashop Addons exclusive, the Amazon Market Place for Prestashop is the #1 solution to sell your products online to Amazon Marketplace.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your Store with Amazon Market Place by reaching new customers, increasing sales and creating more visibility for your e-commerce : Synchronize products, stocks, and prices on Amazon Create Products on Amazon directly from your Prestashop backend The Amazon Market Place application lets you seamlessly share your inventory on Amazon and updates your catalog quickly Take advantage of the resources available to you on the internet and boost sales when you share your products on one of the world’s most popular shopping marketplaces. Instructions : Open an account on Amazon Market Place: http://sellercentral.amazon.fr (Professionnal Account) Install the Amazon Market Place for PrestaShop application Put your products on line in just three clicks Boost your sales potential and distribute your products across the entire Amazon market: Europe : France, United Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Italy Worldwide : United States, Canada, Japan, China, India Take your potential to the next level: an optional application allows your sales prices to be adjusted regularly on Amazon relative to your competitors! Orders: An orders tab allows your orders from Amazon to be integrated directly into your PrestaShop back office. You can choose: To import your orders manually Ise scheduled tasks and processing orders as they arrive Shipping Notification : A tool on the orders page allows to notify directly the customer that their Amazon Market Place order has been dispatched. The tracking number is sen and the status is automatically switched on Amazon Products: Your products must have an UPC (and/or EAN13) code or an Exemption from Amazon. The module is able to create products having an EAN13/UPC code directly into the marketplace Using a simple formula, you have the chance to create a price increase rule for your products, for example to cushion the effect of the margin collected by Amazon (e.g. +10% on all products or +1 euro on all products) News and Features: Product Sheet Creation directly from Prestashop The module allows to send Title, Image and Description Handling Second Hand and Refurbished products Multi-Carriers (Eg: Standard, Express) Shipping fees per articles, per category or global FBA Support, FBA Multi-Site/Multi-Channel Support Sales/Discount Fast Inventory Edition Automatic Invoice by Email through Amazon Web Service Automatic shipping notifications, status changes Information about product creation feature : http://blog.common-services.com/en/amazon-market-place-pour-prestashop-v3-5/ Information about FBA features : http://blog.common-services.com/en/amazon-3-9-fba-fulfillment/ Other news and informations on our blog : http://blog.common-services.com/en
module.author: Common-Services

module.name: pm_advancedsearch4
module.description: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.description_full: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.additional_description: Provide to your customers the products that meet their needs. Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products, Advanced Search 4 can add as many search engines as you want and place them in different places on your website. This module was developed in an effort to provide short loading times, even on large catalogs. Your visitors can browse products that match their search criteria, to make their purchases in minimal time. Winner of the Best PrestaShop Modules Awards 2012 Advanced Search 4 won the Best module of the year Award at the PrestaShop BarCamp of Barcelona (Spain)! Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products. Advanced Search 4 adds the multi-layered navigation, search by step, filters and multi-criteria searches. Each search is saved over the navigation, allowing your visitors to return to the results of their research at any time. Google is his friend This PrestaShop Addon is a small revolution for SEO. Advanced Search 4 generate a mass-produced products pages optimized for SEO, and without duplicate content! Pick up your criteria on which you want to improve your SEO, validate them, and here you go with hundreds of pages listing your products, including: re-written URL, H1 tags, description, meta tags, automatised cross links... To maximize your reputation, these results pages can be shared on most social networks places around the internet, as well as sent by e-mail.

module.description: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy
module.description_full: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy to send your customers gorgeous newsletters that keeps them coming back to shop! You can count on this module to do all the hard work for you!

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: pm_seointernallinking
module.description: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.description_full: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.additional_description: Enhance your PrestaShop SEO Internal linking is the creation of links between pages of your shop, using keywords you want to achieve a better place on Google. To optimize the SEO of your website, it is essential to create an internal linking that will allow search engines to browse your shop in the most easy way as possible. The goal is to provide maximum informations with the least clicks deep. SEO Internal Linking PrestaShop module optimizes the organization of navigation in your store, and plays an essential role in your SEO strategy. Define the keywords on which you wish to be listed and their landing pages, and let the module create the links for you! If you want to add automatic links in your categories descriptions, consider installing our PrestaShop module HTML On Descriptions. Do we really need internal linking? Internal linking strategy based on specific keywords is an optimization method that has proven its worth. Especially to enhance a content relevance. Among the disadvantages, you should know that the installation of these links is long and tedious, and requires to follow SEO good practices, to not over-optimize (which would be detected by Google), and must be updated regularly to track changes in your catalog. With this in mind, we have developed this module, allowing you to deploy thousands of cross links between your pages within minutes, while being sure to observe best practice guidelines of White Hat SEO. It has been designed to support both SEO agencies and e-shop owners. SEO Internal Linking is really simple to manage.
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: ordertaxprofitreport
module.displayName: Advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports
module.description: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file
module.description_full: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file.
module.additional_description: Get perfect visibility on your shop's and products' profitability ! The default PrestaShop installation does not provide a one-click tool that allows you to obtain important accounting and financial data: tax due, net sales volume after discounts and, most importantly, profit and profit margin. Not only will this report provide you with all this data, but it will even allow you to answer questions like "what percentage of total sales and / or profits does this specific brand, supplier or product category represent ?". This stylish and pleasant AJAX based module allows you to generate different types of preformed reports with all this information. They can be viewed on screen in HTML format or exported as a CSV file to manipulate in Excel and / or import into any other information or accounting system. This module is developed and published by Business Tech, certified PrestaShop developer and winner of the 2011 PrestaShop Awards for Best module. You are guaranteed to buy a quality module and to get fast and efficient tech support in case you need it.
module.author: Business Tech
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/en/analytics-stats-prestashop-modules/5255-advanced-sales-tax-profit-and-profit-margin-reports.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports

module.name: pm_multiplefeatures
module.displayName: Multiple Features - Assign your features as you want
module.description: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.description_full: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.additional_description: Add features to your PrestaShop catalog without limits! With Multiple Features, you can assign as many values as necessary for the same product and the same feature. Remove this PrestaShop limitation and start using your features as you want! If you also use our layered navigation system Advanced Search 4 (Winner of PrestaShop Best Module Awards 2012), you can give to your customers a more relevant research in your catalog. Customer study : Ocarat.com: "Some jewelry may have a different composition and an alloy of several metals. PrestaShop provides the ability to associate a feature to a product. However, I want to integrate in my shop a gold ring set with diamonds and emeralds. But features tab does not allow me to do so. I can't assign multiple values to a single purpose. So I have to choose between gold, diamonds or emeralds. Multiple Features remove PrestaShop limits and allows you to use features as you want !"
module.author: Presta-Module
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/en/search-filters-prestashop-modules/6356-multiple-features-assign-your-features-as-you-want.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=multiple features - assign your features as you want

module.name: pm_cachemanager
module.description: Decrease your loading page time generation
module.description_full: Decrease your loading page time generation
module.additional_description: Improve your conversion rate and SEO The statistics are clear: the main reason why a user leave a web page is the loading time. Yahoo! said that adding 400ms to the page loading time on their car website raises the dropout rate from 5 to 9%. (Sources: Performance Web) In addition, the speed display is a guarantee of quality which has a very positive influence on the positioning in the search engines. Let your customers enjoy a more comfortable navigation on your website by shortening the loading time of pages, and saving his time! Limited offer : Price drop & Satisfied or refunded !

module.name: lgabonos
module.displayName: Credit Notes / Memos - Cancellation of Invoices
module.description: Create full credit notes / memos for any invoice you need to cancel. Issue the notes in PDF and send them to your clients
module.description_full: Create full credit notes / memos for any invoice you need to cancel. Issue the notes in PDF and send them to your clients.
module.additional_description: This module allows you to create full credit notes for any invoices that have been issued and then cancelled. With this module, you can issue credit notes by selecting the invoice you want to refund. It only works with issued invoices. No more problems with invoices and journal entries. With this module, you avoid submitting invoices that have been cancelled. You can also issue credit notes in PDF and send them to your clients.

module.name: groupinc
module.description: This module lets you apply an increment or a discount to product price depending on the customer's group
module.description_full: This module lets you apply an increment or a discount to product price depending on the customer's group.
module.additional_description: Apply different price to the product depending on the group that customer belongs to You can apply a increment/discount to: Wholesale price Pre-tax retail price Retail price with tax Apply a markup to your products
module.author: Community

module.name: ec_seo404
module.displayName: SEO - disabled and deleted 301 redirect Products
module.description: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product
module.description_full: End with 404 pages and referencing loss for disabled or deleted product. You will be able to choose for each case a 301 (Ideal for SEO)
module.additional_description: Whenever a product is disabled or deleted, you will be able to assign a 301 redirect. No need to turn your catalog to find out which product is not active or has been removed, you can see them with the module and react accordingly. Not overload your HTACCESS file and therefore no notion necessary to make it work ! The SEO which existed to this product will be redirected in confidence to a similar product, category page, etc. ... And not lose all the SEO that page had. With a color scheme, get in a glance the status of your references: - Green => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active. - Orange => Redirection possible for disabled or deleted products, but the redirection is not active and no link is specified for the redirection. - Red => Redirection enabled, but no link! So page 404 as usual!
module.author: Ether Création

module.name: lgcookieslaw
module.description: Choose the cookies you want to disable when users enter your website and display a warning banner on every page to comply with the EU directive and enable the cookies after informing users and getting
module.description_full: Choose the cookies you want to disable when users enter your website and display a warning banner on every page to comply with the EU directive and enable the cookies after informing users and getting their consent.
module.additional_description: Our module complies with the EU directive 2009/136/EC and allows you to: Disable a list of modules when users enter the website. Because warning users about cookies is useless and illegal if you have already installed cookies on their computer. Display a warning banner on every page to inform users about the use of cookies, ask for their consent and start using cookies legally after getting their consent. Once users give their consent, the warning page will disappear, their consent will be valid during the time set in the module and all the modules using cookies will start working as normal. If users don't accept the use of cookies, our module will disable third-party cookies and keep PrestaShop technical cookies enabled so that users could be able to visit the website.   "Service providers must inform users and get their consent to avoid the invasion of their privacy and the violation of the new law. Online store are responsible for the third-party cookies set on their website." With this module, you can select several modules and disable them until users give their consent. This option is useful to avoid third-party cookies (such as those of Google Analytics, chat scripts, etc). You can also choose where to put the warning banner (top or bottom of the page), its background colour and its percentage of opacity. On the warning banner, you can explain users what type of cookies you use on your PrestaShop store, what they are for, and ask for their consent. You can customise the warning message and the HTML code of the page, and link it to the CMS pages where users can get more information about the use of cookies. Lastly, you can choose to accept cookies by clicking on a confirmation button, by navigating through the website or by displaying a permanent warning message. And do not worry about SEO, search engine robots will not be affected by any means and could crawl your store without enabling the module.
module.author: Línea Gráfica

module.name: pushoncart
module.description: Easily increase your average cart value by offering customized discounts to your client in the shopping cart summary !
module.description_full: Easily increase your average cart value by offering customized discounts to your client in the shopping cart summary !
module.additional_description: Through the Push on Cart module : Easily increase your clients' average cart value Clear your inventory of unsold products of your choice Help customers discover new products and create a demand Improve client satisfaction and customer loyalty thanks to customized discounts on select products

module.description: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.description_full: Improve your conversion rate by 15% (and more) with abandoned carts reminder emails!
module.additional_description: An automatic email is sent to customers each time they add products to their shopping cart but does not purchase. It reminds and encourages them to complete the order. It’s beneficial and easy to use! Automatically send one or more personalized emails to remind your customers about the contents of their cart. This helps turn abandoned carts into sales. Easily create email templates tailored to match your online store’s theme.
